description.value:
At 3rd level, you choose a focus with which to specialize your abilities: the Beast Focus, the Slayer Focus, or the Deep Stalker Focus, all detailed at the end of the class description. Your choice grants you features at 3rd level and again at 5th, 7th, 11th, and 15th level.

Hunter Focuses

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-subclasses.7XF3EBmQ2c1sFHWl]{Beast Focus}

Many hunters are more at home in the wilds than in civilization, to the point where animals consider them kin. Hunters of the Beast Focus develop a close bond with a beast, then further strengthen that bond through the use of magic.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.qxEsNwPUdPfwxK9C]{Deep Stalker Focus}

Most folk descend into the depths of the Underdark only under the most pressing conditions; but the hunters of the deep stalker focus seek to defeat the foes lying below before they can reach the surface.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-subclasses.iFgXO398zHs98tC2]{Slayer Focus}

Some hunters seek to master weapons to better protect civilization from the terrors of the wilderness.
